posts.post_content:
Offered here are some inexpensive S74 colored silks that are Priced to sell. A chance to get a type at as little as 39.99 to 59.99
Hartsell is 39.99. It is a nice purple color with red ink printing. It has some staining, creasing and fraying
Street is a nice peach color and has some light wrinkling and fraying mostly on top. Old Mil Cigarettes is not frayed and easy to read. it is a nice peach color with red ink printing 49.99
Reulbach is also a nice purple color with tougher blue Ink printing. Very striking silk . Fraying at the top. The typical factory fold crease in the middle with Old Mill Cigarettes displayed in full nicely 59.99
Bell is a green silk color with red printing. It has some fraying top and bottom both Old Mill ad and factory at top are easy to read 59.99
The prices are net. Please add 5.99 for shipping with tracking for 1 or more
